website_summaries.verdict: A non-toxic, high density foam construction makes this set a worthy contender for first place. Covers both edges and corners.
pros: Soft, shock absorbing foam delivers excellent protection from bumps and bangs
Generous edge and corner guard combo covers all the bases
Comes with 3M adhesive for hassle-free installation
Adheres to US child safety regulations
Available in multiple colors and sizes
cons: Some users noted that the edge guards seem to loosen more readily than the corner guards

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other products
customer_reviews.text: Product as describe but not as good as others. A few days ago I purchased same product from amazon, ran out, went to purchase more and it was sold out. I ended up going with this based on description but overall not super satisfied. Not returning because I only needed about a 2 foot piece and product does work. Just not as nice as other stuff I purchased. As you can see from photo it’s quite smaller than other brands. Same foam but size and amount is much less. If I needed more or didn’t have other stuff for fireplace, I would return. Like I said- it does work and sticks well, but I’ve found better elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product- lower profile than Bow-Tiger
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The edges are lower profile than Bow-Tiger (also on amazon). I have purchased both and have used both. The Bow-Tiger is much bigger (wider and thicker) which was really good for around our fireplace. However, this one by Bebe Earth was nicer for our island, because we didn't want a big thick cushion, we just needed a soft edge cover. Because its a little lower profile, it fits in nicely and doesn't make the island stand out. The tape on the Bebe seems really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Cat-daddy

customer_reviews.title: Ugly faded brown
customer_reviews.text: NOT dark like the picture. Not coffee brown like the description. It's a nasty washed out brown. It will match nothing and will look terrible. Deceptive marketing. See my pic.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Package came missing 4 corners...
customer_reviews.text: This clearly says 8 corners on the package and in the description, but there are only 4 included in the package. I thought they might be in the middle of the package, but there was only extra 3m tape and a door guard. Bebe Earth needs to QC their packages before sending out...
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Soft enough that when my daughter hits ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Soft enough that when my daughter hits a hard edge she doesn't even notice. We have put it around our bookcases, corners of tables, and even on walls. The products hasn't fallen off or disintegrated when my daughter has tried to use it as a teether. Thank you Bébé Earth for making me feel like my home is a completely safe environment for my child to explore, learn and grow!
customer_reviews.author: AaLeiyah DeSimas

customer_reviews.title: It is great! So great that I have just placed my ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are both in our eighties and she is having a major loss of vision which is causing her to loose her stability at times. I just received my first roll which i have installed on our kitchen Island. It is great! So great that I have just placed my second order to apply to our dinning table. Super easy to install. A wonderful product. Yuma AZ
customer_reviews.author: Yuma Bob

customer_reviews.title: This products is excellent quality and extremely easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This products is excellent quality and extremely easy to install. I was impress on how much padding it actually had and the color match for my coffee table and entertainment unit was not bad at all. My corner/edge work was not as precise on my part but for my first attempt it was easy, simple, worked but I would have used a razor blade or utility knife instead of scissors. My only comment the corners have the 3M tape attached but the rest of the edge protection you have to apply yourself using the included roll of 3M tape. I wish, like the corners, the tape was already attached. It would have been easier and more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: DrDetail

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive doesn't come off easily as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something permanent than this product gets 4 stars. But, for those who are using this product for just a few years to protect their kids it destroys your furniture. The adhesive doesn't come off easily as advertised. I have to stripe and refinish our coffee table now because the adhesive destroyed the edges. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan O

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and put it around a coffee table that has a glass top with corners and around our bed that has this edge sticking out all around. It was easy to put on. Doesn’t look like it will be easy to take off (might be difficult to take the sticky part from the furniture later), which is a good thing for now while the baby is crawling and flipping everywhere. I got the black color and it matched our dark coffee furniture very organically. It’s soft, looks and feels similar to the pads you would find at the gym. I will be ordering another one because one pack wasn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our purposes!
customer_reviews.text: We babyproofed our cabinets and stairs, but didn’t think about the table right behind the couch. Our toddler kept hitting his head on the edge of the table — not bad enough to do real damage, but we didn’t want to wait til he did! Ordered this and I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to apply. At one end I even made a bit of a mistake not pulling it enough, so it was short and I had to pull it back up to fix it. I was nervous it was going to either rip or ruin the furniture but it was actually very easy. Glad we found a good solution! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina H

customer_reviews.title: Works great for pets too!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this product to protect my dog from poking her eyes or knocking her head on my glass desk. She's just the right height for her head and face to come in contact with the corners and she loves to squeeze in next to me and put her head on my lap while I am working or try to look up on my desk to see what's there. I no longer have to worry since I purchased this product. It arrived quickly, was easy to install, took just a few minutes, is super soft, and works great! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H

customer_reviews.title: My $400 tv console is ruined.
customer_reviews.text: I am so beyond upset i don’t even know what to say.. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. i have had this adhesive on for about a month now..i went to go check on it today and noticed that not only is the adhesive eating away at the paint on my tv console it is also peeling away..Where do i go from here? my $400 tv console is now ruined. please save your money and your furniture and do not purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We have bought similar product from another company previously and was not happy. We decided to try Bebe earth this time and it's not disappointing. Adhesive is genuine 3M adhesive and it sticked nicely to brick without issues. It's more than few weeks and still good. All corners stayed put without issues, the other companies product we used on dining table fell apart on corners on second day. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Sticky tape melts in the summer
customer_reviews.text: At first things product was great, it even comes with this cow teether made of the same foam which was a nice surprise and its been my daughters favorite thing for a while now. Its easy to apply the 3M sticky tape to the foam and apply to whatever surface you need. The downside to this is my 10 month old daughter can pull it off with ease, so I keep having to reapply it. It leaves a very sticky residue on the surface its on, and ive also noticed that since its summer its starts to melt so ill just enter the room and itll be dangling off the table. The corner parts havent budged though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on Granite countertops
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a kitchen island with a granite top. We adhered it to the lower edge as that was where the potential for bumps was. Since the corners were curved, we used a continuous piece which conformed to the edges perfectly. While we got it for our toddler Grandson who is just about at clunk his head height, my daughter was the first to whack into a corner. It cushioned it just the way we hoped. We'll be getting more for all the other edges that need to be protected.
customer_reviews.author: casplayer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 92 year old mothers bathroom. She is at the age where she is concerned with falling and the counter in her bathroom worried her. Cream is the color of her counter top and this matched beautifully. She was all worried it would look tacky but it actually looks kind of like fancy edging. It is soft and it was basicly peal and stick. So far cleaning the counter has not adversely effected the look. So she now feels safer and didn't give up attractiveness of her bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JHB

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product with garbage tape.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this foam is terrible and the tape used is hardly acceptable. First off, the tape doesn’t come pre-attached so you have to manually adhere it all. By doing this, it greatly affects the length of the foam and the ability to fit correctly on the edges. The tape used must be a second-rate 3M adhesive because the cost of good quality tape alone would be more than this product as a whole. I am highly skeptical of all these positive reviews, stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids
customer_reviews.text: I put this stuff all around the sharp corner edges of my bed frame, my shins have felt so much better ever since! I have the brown Ikea Malm bed frame, and the brown color corner guard matches it really well, it just looks like an extra trim piece and blends in perfectly. It sticks very strongly; even though it gets brushed against a lot, it's still solid after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Was almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The product is tops. I love the product, but the vendor sent 3 of 8 corners, then they sent me a replacement, and that one came with 4 of 8 corners. I feel they either don't care about their product, or they can't count. Still though if you end up getting the order with the correct number of edges, you will not be disappointed with the product. Make sure to follow instructions carefully as I've seen people ignore it and complain about shrinkage. If you stretch the rubber while applying it of course it will shrink back over night. You need to gently lay it on the surface. Again this is great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo Billy

customer_reviews.title: These are decent
customer_reviews.text: I put these along the bottom of our couch and on our entertainment center, as well as some wall corners. Putting the strips on is a pain but they stick decent. There are some spots that are coming off because my daughter keeps pulling herself up on them, but I don't imagine anyone else's adhesive strips would hold against that day in and out either, it's the nature of thin adhesive. A bit pricey but we are happy with them, the extra corners and door slam protector are a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Danny E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I’d buy again. One minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job well. It sticks to the edges of our wooden coffee table perfectly. Our daughter pulls herself up on the table and it stays in place. It’s a good product and I will certainly be buying at least one more roll. Only one flaw in the product. It’s not quite big enough to reach the bottom edge of the 1” thick table top. Meaning if my daughter stands up under the table, the bottom edge is still exposed. This isn’t a huge problem because this phase of unbalanced standing won’t last that long. So I still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bid

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for brick!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a brick fireplace - the adhesive doesn’t work well at all. I had cleaned the brick and everything, then waited a couple hours. Still barely sticks and always comes off. I don’t know how well it works on surfaces but I’m assuming brick is one of the big reasons folks purchase this - and for that I do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Warford

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the bottom of a fireplace, and while they seem durable and soft, they began falling off in some spots the very next day. Some places they have stuck well, several weeks later, though. I have had to put pillows against the fireplace to keep my baby from seeing it and ripping it off. It comes with a good amount to cut to whatever length you want, but you have to put the tape on the strips yourself. (It is included.)
customer_reviews.author: pepperlarue

customer_reviews.title: Many dents on the guard
customer_reviews.text: I installed the guard on my bed frame, since this packed in the plastic package, so I guess because of that, it cause some damage on the guard during the transportation, there are dents everywhere on the first 7 ft of the guard. I'm Still able to use, Just it looks bad. I think they need to improve the product packaging to preven such incident happens again. Orther than that, I think it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth 50 stitches. 10/10 would protect again.
customer_reviews.text: Tell you what, this stuff has saved my kid's face on multiple occasions. It's been on our coffee table, which is actually a heavy old chest, for about a year now and it hasn't come loose at all. Just today, the boy takes a flying swan dive face first into the corner of the chest, and his forehead literally bounces off the corner. He's not light, either. He carries some force with him. Without this foam, I would have been taking him to urgent care for stitches. But after a couple minutes of crying, he's back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Konyndyk

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to stone
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding something to baby proof my rounded stone fireplace hearth, but this actually sticks! It has been attached for about a month now with no sign of peeling off, even with baby walking along. Baby shows no interest in picking at it. The adhesive is 3M brand. You do have to attach the adhesive tape to the backside of the foam strip yourself which was a small extra step in the install process. It didn't take long. For the price this was an excellent solution!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay product.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the installation instructions to the T. However, the adhesive tape isn't very strong. My LO managed to peel off the corners within 5 tries. Even the edge has begun peeling off at some places, although the LO hasn't managed to remove it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Vinay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick to stone, but would probably stick to other surface
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great idea, but did not work too well for us. We bought it to place around the stone bottom of the fireplace to protect our toddler from needing stitches if she fell. It took about 20 minutes with my husband and I working together to apply this. It was really a two person job applying the 2 sided tape to the foam. It seemed to adhere pretty well, but between the baby and the dog, it was off the next afternoon. Great concept but kind of disappointing. I wasn't surprised as it was stone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen I

customer_reviews.title: Saved my grandbaby from injury!
customer_reviews.text: I was recently visiting my daughter and newly toddling granddaughter and noticed that the edges of her TV cabinet and side tables were quite pointy. Foreseeing some possible tumbles, I immediately browsed Amazon and found these and have them delivered Prime. My daughter installed them as soon as they came. Not even a full two days later, baby girl tripped and fell right into the edge of the TV stand. She hit quite hard and of course cried but if we had not had the corner guards on she probably would have split her face open. She had only the slightest bruise the next day. Highly recommend! Saved a trip to the ER for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy and loos nice.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a desk that had pretty sharp edges. The corner pieces installed easily. I did those first. The installation of the longer pieces took a little more skill. First you need to put the 3M double sided tape along the corner of the area, then carefully place the padding. I found it easier to fold out the edges and place the corner before the sides just to stay in alignment. It cuts easily with scissors and is stretchy enough to get a nice match to the corners. The 3M tape is pretty forgiving and allows some repositioning. The notes say to let it cure after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Decker

customer_reviews.title: Nearly 2 feet shorter than described.
customer_reviews.text: The item seems okay. The color is a bit of an ivory color which is better for the most part as most household walls are actually off-white. The issue is the fact the length of the edgeguard is nearly two feet shorter than what they claim (20.x inches?). Other than that, the product seems okay. I'll update the review in the future regarding its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Justmom

customer_reviews.title: The tape is great and easy so install which is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The tape is great and easy so install which is fantastic! It's been preventing blacks and blues in my 8 month old baby that's started to climb everything to walk around. Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: jucodas

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this one has such great reviews. First of all, Its adhesion is horrible and my little one took out every single one in the house. When my little one took them off all paints on the walls came off as well. Now I have so much paint job to do around the house. I ended up taking everything off and threw them away as my little one started chewing on them. I honestly don't like anything about this proeuct. I don't recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It looks better than I thought it would. My husband made us this coffee table before we had children. The edges are unfinished and it’d definitely hurt to hit your head on it. This seemed like the most aesthetically pleasing solution to baby proof. I just put it on today, there’s definitely a learning curve with how to apply the 3M tape – I found putting it directly on the table was easier than trying to stick it on the foam. Time will tell if it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Katelyng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you hate dealing with the edges of an office desk that dig into your forearms. I used cheap methods like electrical tape to soften things out before finding this. I cut a strip out, and it works like a charm. Each strip lasts me a couple of months, so I'd say overall the roll with work for a year. Pretty good deal for the comfort
customer_reviews.author: Yessir

customer_reviews.title: Get this! So good!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! I HAVE HAD THIS ON THE TV STAND SINCE Jan 2019 and it STILL IS UP AND HAS NO WEAR OR TEAR. 10/10!!!!!!!! So I’m clearly a little off on how I put this up BUT let me tell you guys, it’s amazing. I purposely whacked my hand against this to see how squishy it was and it didn’t hurt me one bit. I feel so much better because my 10mo old is fully walking now but sometimes trips. This has taken so much pressure off of me to constantly be near him during this milestone. It looks good too, besides my obvious shaky hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Novak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time buying this table guard. Purchased in 2015 for one baby and now for a second. It’s wonderful. I applied it after the kids went to bed and the next morning my 8 month old was pulling up on the table and pulling on the foam and it didn’t move an inch, pull off or show any wear (even with a little chewing). Got a nice email from the company telling me to apply and let the adhesive sit before use and it worked perfect. I have also removed it off of the table the first time I ordered it. It was on for over a year and did no damage to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea F.

customer_reviews.title: Work great, sticks great, great product
customer_reviews.text: With so many of these to choose from....and having bad experience with similar products before, I'm really please to say that this is a great product. The padding is just enough for the edges and corners. It covers the way its supposed to, the foam does not easily come apart. It sticks well (which was my issue with other brands). You have to peel and stick the tape yourself...but it only takes a few minutes and the edges and corners are well covered and you wont have to be as concerned about your little ones bumping into those sharp edges and corners. I'm really pleased with this product. The cow door guard is a really cute bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for a baby that knows how to get into ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for a baby that knows how to get into things. I applied these to my tables and end table corners and my little one snatched them off with ease, the adhesive is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for custom baby proofing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cushion. Corner pieces are perfect fit for a standard edge. Cutting custom edge guard lengths is a nice feature, however it can be tricky and time-consuming to make. You do have to add the adhesive strips yourself (they are included with product) Overall highly satisfied. As a note, I would not pull off and reapply guards more than a couple times (using same adhesive strip) to ensure strong adhesive properties. Could be used on any edge/corner. I would probably not use this on a painted surface because I would worry it would rip off the paint. (The adhesive is pretty strong)
customer_reviews.author: ZAF

customer_reviews.title: Has multiple uses, protects what you want to protect
customer_reviews.text: For my use this product is great. Comes in enough colors to meet most needs. Very "cushiony", so when it's hit by a head or whatever, it cushions the blow nicely. I thought the roll came with the 3M tape already applied like the corner protectors do. That's not the case, but it's not much of a task to apply the tape. Also it's very easy to cut the roll to length with a scissors. I recommend the product for any edges or corners that you're concerned a head, hand, foot or whatever might strike.
customer_reviews.author: CheyenneRiver

customer_reviews.title: great item!
customer_reviews.text: really great product! will help alot protecting your child from danger of the corners! seller gave you tip..read it! another tip.install it without your kid seeing it. so they won't pay attention to it much and will not try to peel it off. really great product! can't complain about the safety it can give. always watch your kids! that works best for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rwi

customer_reviews.title: Good foam, but quality assurance is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Foam makes for nice padding and matches our furniture nicely. The corners come preassembled, but the rest of the foam needs to be cut to length and then have the adhesive strip attached to both edges. This is tough and having an extra pair of hands can make it easier. I ordered two packages, both arrived open and missing some of the corner pieces (missing 6 out of the 16 expected corners). Some of the foam was also scratched. I saved that part for the edges of the furniture that are harder to see. Thankfully I didn't need the missing corners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huss

customer_reviews.title: Great product—a must with kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We used to throw a soft blanket over the corners of our tv stand, but it would always fall off. This edge is super soft and blends in very well with the furniture. It was easy to install—just took a little bit of time to put the sticky tape on the guard, but nothing major. I'm also using this on the corner of my bed because I'm tired of running into it :) I think this is a must product with little kids, don't know anything else out there that will protect sharp corners as this does.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! I went through a lot of other products and read all the reviews and then finally picked this one! I wanted my corner guard to meet these 3 levels of expectation. 1. Not a choking hazard. 2. My son will not be able to pull them off and 3. They have great cushion and padding. This company met all of my expectations and more! The color even matches our coffee table perfectly! I may leave them on for the rest of my life... haha. I'm extremely satisfied with them and their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this product so far...
customer_reviews.text: So far I totally love this product! My 7 mo old is all over the place and pulling himself up holding by the table-it's like a magnet ,he just loves it! So I figured this will b perfect ! It is super easy to install as well! Looks pretty good too i have to say ! ( coming from an OCD person :))) see some pics ! Let's hope it will very helpful and my little one won't eat it or rip it off ( saw some reviews where ppl say their kids do that!!).
customer_reviews.author: yulia

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, lots of effort & not baby proof
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that the low reviews just hadn’t followed directions, so I purchased anyway. I waited til baby went to bed and took a solid hour and a half measuring, cutting and carefully applying adhesive. The only pieces pre-adhered are the corners. This means for the remaining you are going to measure and cut the foam then measure, cut, and apply two pieces of tape to each piece. Not going to lie, it’s a pain. The foam itself is good quality and I wish it stayed on because it doesn’t look half bad. Long story short? My 11 month old walked over and immediately ripped two pieces off then screamed with glee 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Hines

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product! i have it on my wood coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: It almost matches my coffee table! this is a great product! i have it on my wood coffee table and it is still lasting pretty great after 3 months so far. my son likes to chew on it, luckily he hasn't chewed any pieces off yet. but otherwise, great product and very long. my coffee table is pretty large and i had leftovers. they give you 1 1/2 roll of double sided tape to put this on. and the monkey door stop is an added bonus. my son likes to chew on it but its great for the door to prevent him from slamming his hand in the door. great product! highly recommend for baby proofing!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany/Corleone Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, last a reasonable amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought a first set about 3 years before the second set. The first step was placed on tile steps, so they got a lot of traffic from the kids. Definitely cushioned a fall or two over that time, which still hurts, but better than blood everywhere. Something that threw me off was that the adhesive was not stuck on the second set, but I am pretty sure it was on the first. The second set included the adhesive on a roll instead of applied to the straight piece. The corners had the preinstalled adhesive though. Either way, it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: arturo ramirez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Will order more.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the duarability yet as we just put them on but so far so good. Add a lot more cushion than I expected and easy to put on. Seem sticky enough to stay after setting but not sticky enough to ruin my table which I was worried about. Great that it came with 8 corners as I needed for top and bottom of the corners. The monkey door guard was a nice free bonus to save little fingers. Very happy and plan to but more for another table.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous225588

customer_reviews.title: Finally, safe furniture cruising for my baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Simple, but time consuming to apply. Purchased 1 month ago and foam is still in place, despite my one year old's determination to remove it. I placed on all edges of my coffee table and I feel that the newly created rim has actually encouraged my daughter in a positive way to cruise by holding on to the foam. It does not look super sleek, but who really cares when this new found safe space can provide you with peace of mind. The double sided tapes works great and the foam is easy to cut. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy RN

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. It is so easy to put on, and it STAYS on, until you want to take it off. It is a thick and extremely cushioned dense foam. This will protect my sweet grandbaby from hurting herself on those terrible 90 degree pointy furniture corners that could have split a little head open. I actually wouldn't mind keeping them on the furniture for the safety of the grandparents' shins and knees, LOL. Terrific product, well worth the money. It was shipped promptly, and was received in A+ condition.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieMB

customer_reviews.title: Not as adhesive as they should be
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small footprint and blends into a white surface. Cons: you have to manually apply the tape to the bumpers (except the corners). This is tedious, and seems like it would be easier for the end user if it was done beforehand. They also fall off unless you use your own adhesive. We had to use Gorilla glue.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I built a beautiful guard rail for my campers bunk, but wanted to make sure my little ones did not bump their heads on the corners of the rail when climbing down the ladder. The side protection was just a bonus. No injuries and it stays on extreme well even with the constant touch from them going up and down.
customer_reviews.author: I smell of elderberry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, somewhat easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product. We have a square Ikea coffee table and it came with more than enough to line it. Installation of the corners was so easy but applying the tape to the long pieces was difficult. I did not measure with a tape measure so I ended up with small gaps, that was my fault. So be sure to measure exact like the directions say and not eyeball it like I did. It's staying on pretty well and has held up to my 10 month old tugging and biting it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Works on brick
customer_reviews.text: New double-sided tape allows for attaching to brick, which was my main need. It works well and doesn't take away from the aesthetics of the room. I'm surprised, however, at how small and narrow the foam bumpers are. I imagined these would be twice as big, but maybe that's good. I just expected a bit more protection. Having said that, I'm not sure if it's needed. I cannot attest to the safety, but the sharp corners are covered and that's all I really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Day

customer_reviews.title: Great on horizontal edges but peels off of vertical edges
customer_reviews.text: I need one vertical edge of a piece of furniture protected from bumps and am about to reapply the same strip of baby proofing for the THIRD time. It's just gravity and the fact that the strip comes coiled. No matter how much I try to straighten the strip and no matter how much and well I apply the adhesive, it slowly peels itself right off and ends up on the ground. I really wish that this came with better adhesive tape.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I needed to baby proof my glass coffee table edges. No accidents yet, but it seems padded enough to at least make a fall onto the edge of the glass table a lot less traumatic. This was so easy to install, and doesn’t look so bad either. My daughter hasn’t ripped it off yet, and the 3M double sided tape sticks well. I’m just hoping it will be easy to remove as well once I’m done with it, so I may have to update my review over time.
customer_reviews.author: KidAlexro

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you have a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product & would recommend it to anyone with small kids. My daughter has already tested it a few times & it saved her tears both times. There is a small learning curve when installing the long pieces. I had little fingers trying to grab everything while installing so I rushed a bit. It would be a good idea to install during nap time. I would like to know what the monkey is for though.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to go around a coffee table in the middle of our living room. Followed instructions and installed late afternoon after grandson went to bed and by the next evening he was pulling on it to bring himself to a standing position. Just starting to take steps with assistance he makes his way round and round this table, pulling on these bumpers all the way around. These things are amazing and give plenty of cushion for safety as well as looking as if they were a part of my table. Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Drewbstew

customer_reviews.title: Have to put adhesive on every single spot to make sure stick pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: Easy and simple to install, but the adhesive is not strong enough...you have to put every single spot with double tape. I have to redo it for adhesive...since after 3 days mostly all of them came off. But once I put all the spot with adhesive, is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lina L

customer_reviews.title: "Pure White" is an odd vaguely neon yellow green color.
customer_reviews.text: The pure white is definitely not pure white...it has a weird neon yellow green tinge to it. Returning as it looks very odd with our decor! (Pictured next to a package of other baby proofing items that are actually white.)
customer_reviews.author: Grady8384

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am not using it in the traditional sense because I have no children, but a blind old puppy who runs into everything and does it without any grace. I lined the corners of the free standing stairs that lead to the bed with the edge and corner protector. Works great and stays on. Wish I didn't have to apply the tape myself though, I'm all fingers and no talent when it comes to applying tape.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Pen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So I got this because my 1 year old daughter loves to jump around in the worst places. I have to say that this is definitely worth buying. Tested it out myself, let's just say that without it... I probably would've split my head open. You have to do whatever it takes to protect your kids! lol
customer_reviews.author: Jose Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Hard removal
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend for temporary install. Purchased to cover furniture edges for crawling baby. It sticks very well however after a year our toddler began picking at the strips so when I went to remove them the adhesion or tape used stripped furniture. The adhesion was thick and would not come off. Had to use water, soap, a butter knife and goop be gone to remove adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as advertised. We are using it for a other than baby protection. We are using as old people protection. We have a 5th wheel and the end of the bed there is a wooden projection and this was perfect to cover it. Also, used it on cabinet doors and the separation on the main room to the slide. I have banged my head on both of these too many times to mention. This will help me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! My coffee table has a beveled edge and no other corner guard would fit it. I was skeptical bc many had said that the adhesive was hard to get off but after my 5 yo son purposely pulled part of it off 🙈 and I had to reattach it, I was able to remove the residue with just a little elbow grease. I’m sure it will be a bit of a project when we are ready to take it off the whole table but it’s better than stitches!
customer_reviews.author: KCunningham

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, functional and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So glad we got this! Installation was really easy and customizable, and the padding is truely spongey, even on the sharp corners I don't have to worry about my daughter splitting her head open as she learns to walk. One note would be to add the 3M tape to the edge bumpers before cutting them since I think they shrink a bit when the tape is on. A must have for any household with sharp corners/edges and toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Super thin
customer_reviews.text: Disappointingly thin. What are they expecting to protect with this? It’s about half the width and thickness of the bumpers I was trying to replace (older bumpers are the brown ones in the picture)
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: making it look better than if I fixed one of those pool noodle ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the bottom edge of our brick fireplace in our living room. I had had a child fall onto the corner of it before and bruise their head and got this afterwards. It blends well with the brick coloring, making it look better than if I fixed one of those pool noodle floaties onto it. It’s easy to apply and comes with a good amount as well. I was actually able to cut enough for my sister-in-law’s fireplace AND still have more to use for whatever I might need.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Wiant

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Bébé Earth Baby Proofing Edge & Corner Guards and it was delivered on time as promised. The edge guard is very easy to apply on the edge of my metal table top. For the past few years my husband used sponge and tape to wrap around the table edge to prevent our grandchildren to bump into it. It looked so ugly so I searched on the web and found this Bébé Earth Baby Proofing Edge & Corner Guards. I am very satisfy with this product and I wished I had bought this few years back. Now my metal table top looks new and gorgeous without the thick sponge around it.
customer_reviews.author: cy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. It stuck very well to the brick ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It stuck very well to the brick around my fire place. My toddler was able to take a bite out of it though. I’m not sure why he tried that little trick but beware that it could pose a choking hazard if little ones try to chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my breakfast bar stools so they stopped hitting the wood on my kitchen island. Wipe with rubbing alcohol first, its essential or it will fall off. Did that and now they have been on a week and still staying on. Lots of boys so that is a testament to the quality and adhesion :).
customer_reviews.author: Creative Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Corners work well, strips not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until our daughter just pulled it off like it wasn’t any big deal. Corner protection is good but the long strips were easy for her to pull off. She’s 14 months. We waited the full 24 hours before allowing her to get near the nesting tables as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pc

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the kid's heads safe around counters!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on our kitchen counter, where there is an open area for bar stools and what not that my kids eventually became too tall to run under. It has helped prevent a lot of bruises and tears, they seem to bounce off it really well! The biggest problem is that the tape has not held well in a lot of places, but its still a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, pliable
customer_reviews.text: I used this for me, as an adult, on the corners of our cabinets in the camper since I hit my head a few times, sitting up near the edge of the bed. It works great. It is super plush yet flexible to go around corners. It doesn't stay the greatest when on the bottom of cabinets. I have to push it back up to stick occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This cushion works great. it is easy to apply and has a nice, clean appearance. We used it for our step down into the family room and no longer need to worry about our 18-month-old landing face-first on the step. It also makes the step down more noticeable for some of our guests.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: I have a one year old that was becoming super mobile, loved the fireplace area
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several different products prior to ordering this. I have a one year old that was becoming super mobile, loved the fireplace area. Mother-in-law and momma were stressing out about him hitting his head on the edge. It was pretty jagged, we have natural stone. I bought this guard and laid it around the edges. Stuck extremely well. Easy to install, just have to cut a little. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for fireplace - great for other substraights.
customer_reviews.text: Great until it falls off. Unfortunately they show a brick fireplace but this doesn't stick to mine. Its saved our child a few times, but its been on for almost 2mo and its falling off already from the fire hearth. The glass table w/ corner protectors are still going/holding strong and my son can't peel them off... the monkey bumper is just ok - not soft like the white ones...sometimes just falls from the doors. Great customer service though as they follow up on their product.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive isn't very strong
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to baby-proof my house, specifically our glass coffee table. It was really easy to install, but the adhesive isn't very strong and my baby can easily peel it off the table. This is the second edge proofing I've used and both had a similar adhesive problem. I'll likely look for a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Sticks really well
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this would come off easily, but it is firmly stuck on. Luckily it is an unfinished-wood table. The padding gives me peace of mind since I have clumsy and foolhardy kids. I had some trouble positioning it just right since it is so sticky and I am usually good at that kind of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon Face

customer_reviews.title: Already peeling off
customer_reviews.text: Well I wanted to really like this but my baby, less than a year, has already figured out how to pull this off. So glad I wasted my money on this. And yes I installed it correctly per the instructions that came with the package.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit difficult getting the sticky tap on the actual padding. Then is was difficult putting the padding on the edge of the table. It was much smaller than bumpers I have bought in the past. My 9-month old ripped off half of them within 2-weeks. Not worth the hassle or the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STICK TO PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I placed the product onto the legs of my chairs beciase I wanted the added safety for my LO. The set up process is pretty straight forward and easy to follow. Unfortunately THE TAPE DOESNT EVEN ADHERE TO THE PRODUCT. You would think they would've thought to have the surface of the product where the tape adheres to, to be a "tape friendly" surface. But it isnt. The product started to pop off ONE DAY after setting it up. I live in a non-humid very arid climate so there is no excuse for the product to not work. Dont waste your money or time on this product. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sk3454

customer_reviews.title: Toddler life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We had a few sharp corners that our son had a small run in with but nothing terrible.. Just enough to scare me. So I decided to try this out and see if it would make a difference. The day that I got and installed it on the side of our fishtank stand my son got his head slammed into the corner hard enough to bounce off of it. Without this guard placed I have no doubt this could have been an er visit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby proofing
customer_reviews.text: Love this for baby proofing the house. We used it on cabinets, door hinges, baseboards, and the fireplace. It sticks good unless your baby is like mine and pulls things off. He can get it off the hinges. The corner ones come up w little on the baseboard too... but they are so easy to push back on. I only wish they sold the corners alone as I had to buy 3 sets to get enough corners.
customer_reviews.author: Althea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install. We've had it on our fireplace for about a year now and it's all still there! Very convenient and it's pretty discreet... as discreet as a foam lining on your fireplace can be, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly but the tape does not stick. The foam was easy to cut and I’m going to buy Gorilla double sided tape to see if that works. The foam came off although it has not been touched since I installed it a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Brick Fireplaces
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing this product. It does NOT adhere to my brick fireplace. I bought it because I saw that the seller said it would stick to brick in the FAQ section of the product information. There were also no instructions included. While none of the pieces are sticking well, the pieces that I placed on the vertical edges of my fireplace literally fell off in the time it took me to write this review. The only positive thing I have to say is that the color is a nice dark brown, as was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Edges are fine but the double sided tape does not hold
customer_reviews.text: The double sided tape supplied with these baby proofing edges is not sticky at all. The edges do not say on for long. I would recommend using your own double sided tape or finding a better product.
customer_reviews.author: HALY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Within about a week, our 13-month-old pulled off one of the corners. It's been a few weeks now, and 2 more are gone. I ordered some replacement corners and hope these will last longer. If not, I'll be trying a different product. As an edge guard, it works great. It was really easy to install and has been compatible with a variety of furniture styles and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It’s sticks, it’s foaming and soft!
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT! It’s the best one I’ve purchased. It’s soft and it actually sticks even with my kids trying to tear it apart. It’s so soft and cushioning so they can hit their heads and it won’t hurt as bad. I also like the color As it blends into my cream wall and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: ... and corners of the fireplace but was a little disappointed with the width of them and I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: They are protecting my little girl from hitting her head on the edge and corners of the fireplace but was a little disappointed with the width of them and I have to push them back down to make sure they don't come up. I thought they would cover more brick then they do but they are keeping the sharp edges and corners covered so I'm happy with that!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Tested, Daddy Approved
customer_reviews.text: Installed along the walls my daughter tends to frequent now that she is learning to stand. She fell right into a protected corner two days after I put these on. She landed on her butt and started laughing. My wife almost threw up she was so scared but my daughter didn't care at all. So as long as it is able to stay attached to the wall I will call this one a definite win!
customer_reviews.author: Ken R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Adhesive is strong and product is foamy enough to protect. There’s only one thing that bugged me—it was that the 3M adhesive didn’t come attached to the foam roll, so I had to manually stick it on. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Still sticking
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably, my granddaughter has left these strips in place For over two months. She messed with one end the first day after installation, but has since ignored them. I feel much better about her playing near our brick hearth.
customer_reviews.author: CMTGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed in a bumper pad!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a round glass table top that sits on a cast iron frame. I've tried so many different types of "button" things to keep the top from sliding. It occurred to me one day to try this product. I did and I am so thrilled. It was easy to adhere and the table top has not moved. The frame itself is the exact color of black this rubber bumper is so it's perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Greg or Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive strips are nice and the product is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is as stated. The adhesive strips are nice and the product is easy to apply. What I didn't expect is the size of the product. I had really expected that it would have been wider. That's my mistake as the dimensions are posted clearly. I just didn't take much notice of it. As a bonus, my kids LOVE the monkey-shaped door guard. It does an excellent job of preventing little fingers getting slammed in doors.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyangelwhereareyou

customer_reviews.title: My baby took it off after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product so much. It looks nice and easy to install and almost invisible on my brown-blackish furniture. However, two weeks after I applied it, I found my baby (1 year old) took a piece off and was chewing on it. I reapplied them, using more tapes than the last time. Still, he managed to take several pieces off again after several days. I didn't want to create a choking hazard to my baby, so I took all the pieces off. I wish the tape could be more adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tan

customer_reviews.title: takes them off easily, and then puts them in his mouth
customer_reviews.text: Not working for me at all. My 10-month old son sticks his finger underneath all the gaurds, takes them off easily, and then puts them in his mouth. Him eating the glue on the back of the gaurds is more dangerous than bumping his head, so I had to take them all off, until he grows out of this stage.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Akbarian

product_meta.title: Bebe Earth - Baby Proofing Edge and Corner Guard Protector Set - Safety Bumpers - Child Proof Furniture and Tables - Pre-Taped Bumper Corners - (20.4 feet and 8 corners, Coffee Brown)
feature_bullets: CHILDPROOF ANY ROOM: The Bebe Earth baby proofing corner and edge guard set includes over 20 feet of high-density impact absorbing rubber foam. That’s over 19.6 feet of edge protector and 8 pre-taped corner protectors. Bebe Earth’s table corner protectors for baby safety set also includes over 39 feet (12 meters) of easy-to-peel 3M double-sided white tape and a doorstop to help prevent slamming or pinching kids’ fingers.

DESIGNED BY PARENTS, FOR PARENTS: As parents, we know how exciting (and stressful) it is to welcome a new child into your home, especially when you are preparing to homeschool or work from home. That’s why Bebe Earth high-density foam corner and edge protection strips are designed to be fitted and secured in minutes. Our cushion-soft edge and corner guard kit for furniture ensures that you never worry about little noggins or the table below!

SAFE AND CLEAN MATERIALS: Bebe Earth is an American business that strives to provide your family with peace of mind. Our edge protector for baby safety is fully compliant with US and EU child safety regulations, and is free from BPA and phthalates, which makes it a safe choice for daycares, schools, nurseries and your home.

NO MESS, NO RESIDUE, NO OUCHIES: All Bebe Earth edge and corner guard sets come with easy-to-peel 3M double-sided white tape that adheres securely to surfaces and can be removed easily. Turn your office into a classroom for home schooling or protect your child’s room while you are working from home.

SECURES FURNITURE AND MORE: Our corner protectors for furniture can be used to childproof sharp corners on any hard surface or furniture in your home, including tables, desks, countertops and walls. Keep your running, climbing and jumping kids safe wherever they are in the house.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,504 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
